record.field:
Dear ${ctx["name"]},

Please find the action points from the Review dated ${object.review_date} for your reference and action.

% for action_point in ctx["action_points"]: %endfor
Action Points Completion Date
${action_point[0]} ${action_point[1]}






Regards,

GSS - Team.

Dear Srinivasan,

Need your approval to register the following deals in OMM.

Account Name: ${object.account_id.name}

Proposed Solution: ${object.proposed_solution}

Products: ${ctx["products"]}

List price of BOM in USD: ${object.bom_price}

Corresponding discounted price in USD (which will go in OMM): ${object.discounted_price}

Discounted %: ${object.discount}

Direct / RFP: ${object.direct_rfp}

Oracle Sales Manager (Tagged to this opportunity): ${object.oracle_sales_manager}

To Access the OMM: Click here


Thanks & Regards,

${object.create_uid.name}

Dear ${object.opportunity_id.user_id.name},

${object.account_id.name} - Deal Registration ID: ${object.deal_reg_id}.

Deal Registration Status: ${ctx["sales_stage"]}

Fusion Status: ${object.fusion_status}

Fusion Oppty No: ${object.fusion_number}

To Access the OMM: Click here


Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.opportunity_id.user_id.name},

${object.account_id.name} deal is registered in OMM. Will update you the status accordingly.

${object.account_id.name} - Deal Registration ID: ${object.deal_reg_id}.

Proposed Solution: ${object.proposed_solution}

Products: ${ctx["products"]}

To Access the OMM: Click here


Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

${object.account_id.name} - Deal Registration ID: ${object.deal_reg_id}.

${ctx["updates"]}

% for changes in ctx["changes"]: ${changes}
%endfor

To Access the OMM: Click here


Regards,

JMR GSS Team.
OMM Registration from lead Updating Template

${object.account_id.name} - Deal Registration ID: ${object.deal_reg_id}.

${ctx["updates"]}

% for changes in ctx["changes"]: ${changes}
%endfor

To Access the OMM: Click here


Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

This is a reminder E-mail to let you know that the mentioned deal will expire in next 30 days in OMM.

Please take required action by updating the Expiring Date in CRM under the tab Open Market Model.

Also have your respective Oracle counterpart take action to update the same in OMM only then the update will be complete and will reflect in OMM

% for omm_id in ctx["omm_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Expiring Date Oracle Expiring Date
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

The mentioned deal will expeire in next 14 days in OMM. There has been no update so far.

Please take required action by updating the Expiring Date in CRM under the tab Open Market Model.

Also it is important to Inform your Orcale couterpart to take action to update the same in OMM.

% for omm_id in ctx["omm_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Expiring Date Oracle Expiring Date
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

The mentioned deal will expire in next 4 days in OMM. There has been no update so far.Inspite of repeate reminders.

Please take required action by updating the Expiring Date in CRM under the tab Open Market Model.

Also it is important to Inform your Orcale couterpart to take action to update the same in OMM.

% for omm_id in ctx["omm_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Expiring Date Oracle Expiring Date
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

This deal has experid please reach out to your reporting manager to work out a action plan.

% for omm_id in ctx["omm_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Expiring Date Oracle Expiring Date
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.
OMM Opportunity Close Date Notification Template

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

This is a reminder E-mail to let you know that the mentioned deal's opportunity close date will expire in next 30 days in OMM.

Please take required action by updating the Opportunity Close Date in CRM under the tab Open Market Model.

Also have your respective Oracle counterpart take action to update the same in OMM only then the update will be complete and will reflect in OMM

% for omm_id in ctx["opp_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Opportunity Close Date Oracle Opportunity Close Date
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.
JMR Details vs Oracle Details Notification Template
OMM Data Comparing JMR vs Oracle | ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name}

Dear ${object.sales_target_user.user_id.name},

% for omm_id in ctx["sales_stage_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Sales Stage Oracle Sales Stage Remarks
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]} ${omm_id[5]}

% for omm_id in ctx["expiring_date_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Expiring Date Oracle Expiring Date Remarks
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]} ${omm_id[5]}

% for omm_id in ctx["opp_close_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Opportunity Close Date Oracle Opportunity Close Date Remarks
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]} ${omm_id[5]}

% for omm_id in ctx["registration_status_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Deal Registration Status Oracle Deal Registration Status Remarks
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]} ${omm_id[5]}

% for omm_id in ctx["fusion_status_details"]: %endfor
Account Name Deal Reg. ID Proposed Solution JMR Fusion Opportunity Status Oracle Deal Fusion Opportunity Status Remarks
${omm_id[0]} ${omm_id[1]} ${omm_id[2]} ${omm_id[3]} ${omm_id[4]} ${omm_id[5]}



Regards,

JMR GSS Team.

Dear ${object.sales_user.name} ,

Committed Closures as of now for the current quarter.

Top of the Pipe - (Current and Newly Generated ) Mid-Pipe - (Leads converted to opportunities) Bottom of the Pipe - ( Won's)
Category YTD Last Week Current Week Changes/Delta Category YTD Last Week Current Week Changes/Delta Category YTD Last Week Current Week Changes/Delta
No. of Leads: ${ctx['last_week_leads']} ${ctx['current_week_leads']} ${ctx['lead_remark']} No. of Opportunities: ${ctx["last_week_opportunities"]} ${ctx["current_week_opportunities"]} ${ctx["opportunities_remark"]} No. of Wins: N/A N/A N/A
Value: N/A Value: ${ctx["last_week_opp_revenue"]} ${ctx["current_week_opp_revenue"]} ${ctx["opp_revenue_remark"]} Value: N/A N/A N/A
FQO ( Zebra 43-50): ${ctx['last_week_lead_fqo']} ${ctx['current_lead_fqo']} ${ctx['opp_fqo_remark']} FQO ( Zebra 43-50): ${ctx['last_week_opp_fqo']} ${ctx['current_opp_fqo']} ${ctx['opp_fqo_remark']} FQO ( Zebra 43-50): N/A N/A N/A
Very Hot (Zebra 35-42): ${ctx['last_week_lead_very_hot']} ${ctx['current_lead_very_hot']} ${ctx['lead_very_hot_remark']} Very Hot (Zebra 35-42): ${ctx['last_week_opp_very_hot']} ${ctx['current_opp_very_hot']} ${ctx['opp_very_hot_remark']} Very Hot (Zebra 35-42): N/A N/A N/A
Hot (Zebra 30-35): ${ctx['last_week_lead_hot']} ${ctx['current_lead_hot']} ${ctx['lead_hot_remark']} Hot (Zebra 30-35): ${ctx['last_week_opp_hot']} ${ctx['current_opp_hot']} ${ctx['opp_hot_remark']} Hot (Zebra 30-35): N/A N/A N/A
Warm (Zebra 25-29): ${ctx['last_week_lead_warm']} ${ctx['current_lead_warm']} ${ctx['lead_warm_remark']} Warm (Zebra 25-29): ${ctx['last_week_opp_warm']} ${ctx['current_opp_warm']} ${ctx['opp_warm_remark']} Warm (Zebra 25-29): N/A N/A N/A
Cold ( Zebra 0-25): ${ctx['last_week_lead_cold']} ${ctx['current_lead_cold']} ${ctx['lead_cold_remark']} Cold ( Zebra 0-25): ${ctx['last_week_lead_cold']} ${ctx['current_opp_cold']} ${ctx['opp_cold_remark']} Cold ( Zebra 0-25): N/A N/A N/A

Top of the Pipe - (attracting & capturing leads )

% for lead_list in ctx["lead_list"]: %endfor
Customer Name Opportunity Name Business Unit Product/Interest Area Zebra Score Stages
${lead_list[0]} ${lead_list[1]} ${lead_list[2]} ${lead_list[3]} ${lead_list[4]} ${lead_list[5]}

Mid-Pipe - (converting qualified accounts to opportunities)

% for opportunity_list in ctx["opportunity_list"]: %endfor
Customer Name Opportunity Name Business Unit Product/Interest Area Expected OrderBooking Expected closing date Zebra Score Stages
${opportunity_list[0]} ${opportunity_list[1]} ${opportunity_list[2]} ${opportunity_list[3]} ${opportunity_list[4]} ${opportunity_list[5]} ${opportunity_list[6]} ${opportunity_list[7]}

Different between last week and present week closures for the current quarter.

Category Count Remarks
Opportunities Zebra score increased in a week ${ctx["zebra_rating_increased_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities Zebra score Decreased in a week ${ctx["zebra_rating_decreased_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities moved up the sales stage ${ctx["stage_increased_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities moved down in Sales Stage ${ctx["stage_decreased_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities moved to on Hold ${ctx["moved_hold_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities moved to won ${ctx["moved_won_count"]} Remarks
Opportunities moved to Lost ${ctx["moved_lost_count"]} Remarks
New addition compared to last week ${ctx["new_leads_count"]} Remarks

Regards,

JMR GSS Team.
